text: William Isaac Robinson (August 21, 1975 â€“ March 29, 2020) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives as a Democrat from 2019 until his death in 2020. He replaced his mother, Rose Mary Robinson in the state house. On March 29, 2020, Robinson was taken to a Detroit hospital due to breathing problems. He died later that day from a suspected case of COVID-19. He was 44 years old. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Detroit Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lawyers from Detroit Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Isaac Robinson (politician)
